Interface EnvironmentController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface EnvironmentController

      void addNewActivity​(ViewActivityImpl activity)
      Adds a new activity to the environment, based on user's choices.
      int getVisitorsNumber()

      Resets activity list previously set.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
    throws EmptyEnvironmentException
        Starts the simulation.
        Throws:
        EmptyEnvironmentException - if button Start is pressed without adding any activity.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the simulation.

      • addNewActivity

        void addNewActivity​(ViewActivityImpl activity)
             throws ActivityAlreadyPresentException
        Adds a new activity to the environment, based on user's choices.
        Parameters:
        activity - which stores user's choices
        Throws:
        ActivityAlreadyPresentException - if an activity with same parameters has already been added.

      • setVisitorsNumber

        void setVisitorsNumber​(int visitorsNum)
                throws VisitorsOutOfBoundException
        Sets the visitors number as selected by the user in the gui menu.
        Parameters:
        visitorsNum - visitors number
        Throws:
        VisitorsOutOfBoundException - if the number chosen by the user is less than 1 or greater than 100

      • getVisitorsNumber

        int getVisitorsNumber()
        Returns:
        the visitors number.

      • showAnalysis

        void showAnalysis()
        Shows the analysis inferred from simulation.

      • resetActivityLists

        void resetActivityLists()
        Resets activity list previously set.
